Dr. Roger Ingemey                                            Kamp -Lintfort, D -47475

 Management, Operations & Sales Executive                                                                         +49 163 166 2990

   Improve what can be changed  
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Dynamic business leader with proven history of success overseeing complex organizational transitions while maintaining top - 
and bottom -line growth and aligning company mission across teams. Effective manager of processes and people with keen 
ability to iden tify and optimize underperforming initiatives and inspire staff to high levels of performance. Proficient in Kaizen 
principles for ongoing process improvement; creates incentive programs to recognize employee innovation and achievement. 
Broad range of expe rience in global industries including chemical, pharmaceutical, renewable -energy , machine building and 
utilities . Fluent in German (native tongue) and English with basic proficiency in French.  
Areas of Expertise  
• Top- and Bottom -Line Growth  
• Budget  & Cash  Management  
• Process Improvement  
• Change Management  • Lean Principles  
• Business Strategy  
• Risk Assessment/Mitigation  
• Team Leadership  
 • International Sales  
• Employee Engagement  
• Training/Mentoring  
• Communication  
 
Accomplishments  
• Thrives  in international business ; comfortable leading teams large and small in multiple locations and of diverse 
backgrounds.  
• Change management expert: managed business strategies and staff through two acquisitions, resulting in unified vision 
and objectives accompanying  revenue growth and increased presence in global markets  
• Recognized with numerous awards for outstanding leadership and sales, including Inspirational Sales Leader, Best 
Promoted Manager, Best Performing Region, and Invensys Sales Excellence . 
P a g e  2 | 3 
  
Career Experience  
optek -Danulat Gmb H, Essen, Germany/Shanghai, China/Singapore/ Wisconsin , USA 4/2023  – Present  
COO/Managing Director  
Oversee full P&L of $50M and approximately 150 employees for global leader of inline process control solutio ns. Manage, 
assess, and optimize operational productivity of multiple international sites. Increase shareholder value by growing 
market presence  and increasing transparency in business decisions . Reduce business’s exposure to risk factors via 
comprehensive risk analysis and mitigation plan. 
• Played essential role in business development, effecting long -term strategy for 10% YOY profit growth.  
• Identifi ed and replaced underperforming processes with streamlined, robust strategies that improved efficiency by 
70% while elevating customer satisfaction.  
• Designed and implemented holistic leadership and  staff -development program that increased employee 
engageme nt and overall efficiency while decreasing turnover.  
Circor , Cologne, Germany/Stuttgart, Germany/Coimbatore, India  9/2017  – 3/2023  
Vice President Power and Process/Managing Director  
Reported directly to CEO in m anag ing full P&L of $100M  and more than 400 e mployees in three locations  for 
international manufacturer of flow - and motion -control products.  Developed and launched rolling five -year strategic plan 
for increased visibility, shareholder value, and profit growth. Emphasized health and safety as well as efficiency via 
process optimization.   
• Revitalized four stagnating brands, resulting in 8% and 1 1% YOY top -line growth above intrinsic market growth.  
• Realized significant improvements in key metrics : 100% increase in AOI within two years, 100% increase of free 
cash flow, 90% reduction of time -to-quote for spare parts orders, and 50% reduction of safety incidents . 
• Spearheaded and introduced corporation -wide digitization program.
